name: 9fin
slogan: AI powered financial data for the bond market
description:
In the stock market, trading is done electronically by robots, news is instant, data is abundant. In the world of high yield bonds, trading is done by humans over the phone, news takes 20 minutes to hit the market and data sucks. The debt capital markets behave like it's still the 1980s. 9fin aims to fix that.

9fin is artificial intelligence powered financial data for the bond market. We use computer vision & machine learning to find key data on bonds and the companies who issue them. Then we make the data easy to search, filter & analyse at 9fin.com. 

Used by world leading banks, hedge funds and asset managers. Backed by leading VC funds & the only fintech in Europe accepted onto Google's AI residency program. Selected for IA Velocity program, first ever accelerator run by the Investment Association whose members manage £7.7 trillion AUM.

team.title: CEO
team.name: Steven Hunter
team.bioHtml: CEO @ 9fin | Bringing AI to the bond markets.

jobs.title: Covenant Analyst
jobs.description:
9fin's market leading technology uses AI to deliver covenants insight more quickly than anyone else. We're now hiring Covenant Analysts to help build out our coverage. 

Requirements

If you have a legal background & are interested in working in the world of fintech, leveraged finance & distressed debt, and have the following attributes, we are interested in hearing from you:

● 1-2+ years of relevant legal experience - ideally including debt capital markets (primary, secondary, distressed markets)
● A strong commercial awareness of financial markets, and a desire to learn more about fixed income in particular
● A track record of working with high yield bond or leveraged loan documentation
● Excellent networking and relationship building skills
● Effective written and verbal communication skills conveying messages accurately and concisely
● Team player, but also able to work effectively alone (help is always at hand if you need though!)

Responsibilities include:

● Analysing documentation to spot novel covenant trends / insights within primary and secondary leveraged finance markets 
● Using 9fin's proprietary tech to build & expand our repository of covenant databases for our subscribers
● Building a large & high quality contact book of market sources
● Working with the 9fin engineering & business team to develop new legal and covenant product features
● Representing 9fin at industry conferences & events

Key benefits

Salary: Competitive base salary + options.

Holidays: 25 days per year (not including Bank Holidays)

Other benefits: 

● Learning & development budget: We're focused on your career progression and personal development!
● Flexibility for you to work from home / remote when needed
● Team events and outings
● Vitality health insurance & discounted gym membership
● As much tea and coffee as you like :)

jobs.title: Junior Credit Analyst
jobs.description:
9fin's market leading technology uses AI to deliver financial & credit insight more quickly than anyone else. We're now hiring Credit Analysts to help grow our team. 

Requirements

If you are a graduate who has an interest in working in the world of fintech, capital markets & investment and has the following attributes, we are interested in hearing from you:

● Inquisitive and passionate: You are up for the challenge of a role that will morph and transform as we grow.
● A strong interest in financial markets, and a desire to learn about how they work.
● Ability to plan and prioritise important tasks and work with accuracy and attention to detail.
● Effective written and verbal communication skills conveying messages accurately and concisely.
● Enjoy interpreting information and problem solving.
● Team player, but also able to work effectively alone (help is always at hand if you need though!)
● An adequate knowledge of Excel.
● Ability to commence work early in the day (UK markets:  8am - 5pm, 2 days per week, US markets: 1pm - 10pm, 3 days per week)

Responsibilities include:

● Market intelligence: Work with the business team to uncover new transactions in the European debt capital markets. Includes monitoring news flow, liaising with bank syndicate desks, investors and company management
● Relationship management & product evangelism: Working with customers to answer questions on the use of our platform and to gather feedback on new and existing product features
● Deal tracking & audit: Working quickly to validate and sense check financial information extracted by our software. 

Key benefits

Salary: Competitive base salary 

Holidays: 25 days per year (not including Bank Holidays)

Other benefits: 

● Learning & development budget: We're focused on your career progression and personal development!
● Flexibility for you to work from home / remote when needed
● Team events and outings
● Vitality health insurance & discounted gym membership
● As much tea and coffee as you like :)

jobs.title: Leveraged Loan / Distressed Reporter
jobs.description:
9fin's market leading technology uses AI to deliver breaking news more quickly than anyone else. We're now hiring a Reporter / Journalist to help build out our leveraged loans & distressed coverage. 

Requirements

If you are a journalist interested in working in the world of fintech, leveraged finance & distressed, and have the following attributes, we are interested in hearing from you:

● 3+ years of experience in a leveraged finance capital markets newsroom (primary, secondary & distressed markets)
● A strong knowledge of financial markets, and a desire to learn more about fixed income in particular
● A track record of producing unique market moving analysis. At 9fin we never want to re-write press-releases
● Strong existing relationships / network within the European Leveraged Finance community (distressed experience particularly beneficial)
● Excellent networking and relationship building skills
● Effective written and verbal communication skills conveying messages accurately and concisely
● Team player, but also able to work effectively alone (help is always at hand if you need though!)

Responsibilities include:

● Scoop-hunting! Reporting on primary and secondary syndicated loan markets with a particular focus on uncovering distressed opportunities 
● Using 9fin's proprietary data to generate unmatched insights & analytics for our subscribers
● Building a large & high quality contacts book of market sources
● Working with the 9fin engineering & business team to develop new product features
● Representing 9fin at industry conferences & events

Key benefits

Salary: Competitive base salary + options.

Holidays: 25 days per year (not including Bank Holidays)

Other Benefits: 

● Company-wide work from home last Friday of the month
● Learning & development budget: We're focused on your career progression and personal development!
● Once settled in, flexibility for you to work from home when needed
● Team events and outings
● Vitality health insurance & discounted gym membership
● As much tea and coffee as you like :)

jobs.title: Senior Covenant Analyst
jobs.description:
9fin's market leading technology uses AI to deliver covenants insight more quickly than anyone else. We're now hiring a Senior Covenant Analyst to help lead the expansion of our legals offering. 

Requirements

If you have a legal background & are interested in working in the world of fintech, leveraged finance & distressed debt, and have the following attributes, we are interested in hearing from you:

● 3+ years of relevant legal experience - including debt capital markets (primary, secondary, distressed markets)
● A keen commercial awareness of financial markets and leveraged finance
● A strong track record of working with high yield bond or leveraged loan documentation and producing unique & insightful analysis content
● Pre-existing relationships and a strong network within the European Leveraged Finance community 
● Excellent networking and relationship building skills
● Effective written and verbal communication skills conveying messages accurately and concisely
● Team player, but also able to work effectively alone (help is always at hand if you need though!)

Responsibilities include:

● Analysing documentation to spot novel covenant trends / insights within primary and secondary leveraged finance markets 
● Using 9fin's proprietary tech to build & expand our repository of covenant databases for our subscribers
● Building a large & high quality contact book of market sources
● Working with the 9fin engineering & business team to own and manage the development of new legal and covenant product features
● Representing 9fin in the press, at industry conferences & events

Key benefits

Salary: Competitive base salary + options.

Holidays: 25 days per year (not including Bank Holidays)

Other Benefits: 

● Learning & development budget: We're focused on your career progression and personal development!
● Flexibility for you to work from home / remote when needed
● Team events and outings
● Vitality health insurance & discounted gym membership
● As much tea and coffee as you like :)
